### Grafico de sectores sobre el sexo de los fumadores.

```{r}

# Grafico circular 
DF1 %>% group_by(sex) %>%
  summarise(count = n()) %>% 
  hchart('pie', hcaes(x = sex, y = count, color = custom_colors)) %>% 
  hc_add_theme(hc_theme_google()) %>%
  hc_tooltip(pointFormat='<b>Proportion: </b> {point.percentage:,.2f}%>%') 
 %>%
  hc_title(text = 'Grafico de Sectores referente al sexo de los fumadores',
           style(list(fontSize = '15px', fontWeigt = 'bold')) %>%
              )

```
